p: HAdV is a non-enveloped double-stranded DNA virus with over 80 known virus types, divided into seven species [ 1â€“ 3]. Maternal antibody protection prevents infections before 6 months of age, whereafter endemicity is established in over 80% of children by the age of 6 years [ 4]. The incidence does not vary between different countries, but spread, morbidity, and mortality are increased in regions with limited sanitation such as low- and middle-income countries (LMIC) as transmission occurs via droplet, feco-oral, and direct spread [ 5].
